pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchanti kāyaṃ olambentā …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:8.3: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchati kāyaṃ olambento, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
